card.name: Accorder Paladin
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fight for the suns, the surface, and everything in between."

card.name: Ardent Recruit
card.property: Metalcraft — Ardent Recruit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We lost our homes and our kin. We won't let those rotters take our future as well."

card.name: Banishment Decree
card.property: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Choking Fumes
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fall to your knees and welcome our embrace." —Qal-Sha, Priest of Norn

card.name: Divine Offering
card.property: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Phyrexians are vulnerable. Do not despair. We will prevail!" —Juryan, rebel leader

card.name: Frantic Salvage
card.property: Put any number of target artifact cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will mourn when there is time. For now, we survive."

card.name: Gore Vassal
card.property: Sacrifice Gore Vassal: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Then if that creature's toughness is 1 or greater, regenerate it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rid them of their unfaithful organs. Bring new hearts to the unbelievers." —Tome of Machines, verse 1703

card.name: Hero of Bladehold
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Whenever Hero of Bladehold attacks, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

card.name: Kemba's Legion
card.property: Vigilance Kemba's Legion can block an additional creature each combat for each Equipment attached to Kemba's Legion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The squabble over succession was quickly replaced by the struggle to survive.

card.name: Leonin Relic-Warder
card.property: When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Leonin Skyhunter
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The infection has spread farther than we could glimpse from the heights of Taj-Nar."

card.name: Loxodon Partisan
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This war is not about loxodon or leonin, Sylvok or Auriok. To defeat these rotters, we must do it together."

card.name: Master's Call
card.property: Create two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.

card.name: Mirran Crusader
card.property: Double strike, protection from black and from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and hope for what it will be again.

card.name: Phyrexian Rebirth
card.property: Destroy all creatures, then create an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as one drop of the oil exists, the joyous work continues.

card.name: Priests of Norn
card.property: Vigilance Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May our blessings sever the tongues of the forsaken." —Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

card.name: Tine Shrike
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A new bird of prey—one that hunts sentience.

card.name: Victory's Herald
card.property: Flying Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.

card.name: White Sun's Zenith
card.property: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

card.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
card.property: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it." —Pelyus, vedalken ordinar

card.name: Consecrated Sphinx
card.property: Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blessed by the hands of Jin-Gitaxias.

card.name: Corrupted Conscience
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karn's creation is now his master.

card.name: Cryptoplasm
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Cryptoplasm become a copy of another target creature. If you do, Cryptoplasm gains this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If left in the enemy's shape too long, it might be lost to them." —Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

card.name: Distant Memories
card.property: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your hand. If no player does, you draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fleeting shadows of his primitive self have all but vanished." —Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

card.name: Fuel for the Cause
card.property: Counter target spell, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your ideas will be discarded and your will repurposed."

card.name: Mirran Spy
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Accurate information is a precious commodity in times of war.

card.name: Mitotic Manipulation
card.property: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put one of those cards onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They can't even comprehend nature. How could they improve it?" —Venser

card.name: Neurok Commando
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever Neurok Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no more time for secluded study. Answers are there only for those with the courage to take them."

card.name: Oculus
card.property: When Oculus dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In its gaze I saw no mercy, no recognition that I was worthy to exist." —Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

card.name: Quicksilver Geyser
card.property: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexians are tenacious. That's not the same thing as clever." —Tezzeret

card.name: Serum Raker
card.property: Flying When Serum Raker dies, each player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The serum from the blinkmoths they gather greases the joints of witch engines.

card.name: Spire Serpent
card.property: Defender Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, Spire Serpent gets +2/+2 and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mirror to draw its eye, a rod to rouse its rage, and a sword to break its bonds.

card.name: Steel Sabotage
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target artifact spell. • Return target artifact to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work." —Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

card.name: Treasure Mage
card.property: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Turn the Tide
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius." —Varil, Neurok partisan

card.name: Vedalken Anatomist
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. You may tap or untap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Specimen 211 examination report. Observation: graft sublimation incomplete. Result: death. Prepare specimen 212."

card.name: Vedalken Infuser
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

card.name: Vivisection
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexians research with the grace of surgeons and the finesse of butchers.

card.name: Black Sun's Zenith
card.property: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Under the suns, Mirrodin kneels and begs us for perfection." —Geth, Lord of the Vault

card.name: Caustic Hound
card.property: When Caustic Hound dies, each player loses 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, the Mirrans aimed for its exposed gut. The survivors quickly learned to do otherwise.

card.name: Flensermite
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Flesh-Eater Imp
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Sacrifice a creature: Flesh-Eater Imp gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Go for the Throat
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

card.name: Gruesome Encore
card.property: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

card.name: Horrifying Revelation
card.property: Target player discards a card, then puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ours is a glorious transmission! Behold a future where all bow to the Father of Machines." —Isila, Priest of Sheoldred

card.name: Massacre Wurm
card.property: When Massacre Wurm enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Morbid Plunder
card.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the dead are raw materials for the Phyrexian vision of perfection.

card.name: Nested Ghoul
card.property: Whenever a source deals damage to Nested Ghoul, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The chest cavity is cleared of useless meat. I know just what to do with the space." —Gyed, Vault Priest

card.name: Phyresis
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Perfection is at hand. You have been freed of weakness and made compleat." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Phyrexian Crusader
card.property: First strike, protection from red and from white Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Phyrexian Rager
card.property: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Phyrexian Vatmother
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you get a poison counter.

card.name: Sangromancer
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life. Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

card.name: Scourge Servant
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The union of the oil and necrogen has produced many pleasing reactions." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Septic Rats
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever Septic Rats attacks, if defending player is poisoned, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Spread the Sickness
card.property: Destroy target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is ephemeral. Phyrexia is eternal.

card.name: Virulent Wound
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. When that creature dies this turn, its controller gets a poison counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sadly, the extent of Gerkk's healing knowledge was "don't pick at it."

card.name: Blisterstick Shaman
card.property: When Blisterstick Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A productive warren requires a good deal of prodding.

card.name: Burn the Impure
card.property: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Concussive Bolt
card.property: Concussive Bolt deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, creatures controlled by that player or by that planeswalker's controller can't block this turn.

card.name: Crush
card.property: Destroy target noncreature artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A golem's hands know no tenderness.

card.name: Galvanoth
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It chews open Mirrodin's husk and feeds on the outpouring of energy.

card.name: Gnathosaur
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Gnathosaur gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirran creatures that could withstand the Phyrexian oil found an abundance of crunchy snacks.

card.name: Goblin Wardriver
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A true warrior fights with whatever's handy." —Qerk of the Secret Warren

card.name: Hellkite Igniter
card.property: Flying, haste {1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its flight sets the sky itself on fire.

card.name: Hero of Oxid Ridge
card.property: Haste Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Whenever Hero of Oxid Ridge attacks, creatures with power 1 or less can't block this turn.

card.name: Into the Core
card.property: Exile two target artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They believe they're driving us back, but we're leading them to their doom." —Kethek, furnace stoker

card.name: Koth's Courier
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Koth sent partisans into the Tangle to bring survivors to the safe haven of the tunnels below Kuldotha.

card.name: Kuldotha Flamefiend
card.property: When Kuldotha Flamefiend enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, Kuldotha Flamefiend deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

card.name: Kuldotha Ringleader
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Kuldotha Ringleader attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Being surrounded by goblins is less objectionable when they're fighting for you.

card.name: Metallic Mastery
card.property: Gain control of target artifact until end of turn. Untap that artifact. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All will be reforged in the fires of glory." —Urabrask the Hidden

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He didn't have a word for "home," but he knew it was something to be defended.

card.name: Rally the Forces
card.property: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drive them back! Make their underworld into their grave!" —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Red Sun's Zenith
card.property: Red Sun's Zenith deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Shuffle Red Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

card.name: Slagstorm
card.property: Choose one — • Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature. • Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as we have the will to fight, we are never without weapons." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Spiraling Duelist
card.property: Metalcraft — Spiraling Duelist has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never move the same way twice. Those rotters can't grasp chaos."

card.name: Blightwidow
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Creeping Corrosion
card.property: Destroy all artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will reveal the futility of their heresy by showing them how fragile their relics are." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Fangren Marauder
card.property: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fangren fight without comfort of any kind. We can ask no less of ourselves." —Tilien, Sylvok partisan

card.name: Glissa's Courier
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So, the survivors from Oxid Ridge are on the move. Let them come and witness predation in its purest form." —Glissa

card.name: Green Sun's Zenith
card.property: Search your library for a green creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.

card.name: Lead the Stampede
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Melira's Keepers
card.property: Melira's Keepers can't have counters put on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her warriors are the last defense against the coming storm.

card.name: Mirran Mettle
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Metalcraft — That creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our land will not yield to Phyrexian corruption!"

card.name: Phyrexian Hydra
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) If damage would be dealt to Phyrexian Hydra, prevent that damage. Put a -1/-1 counter on Phyrexian Hydra for each 1 damage prevented this way.

card.name: Pistus Strike
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying. Its controller gets a poison counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even a nuisance such as the pistus fly has a purpose in our new world." —Glissa

card.name: Plaguemaw Beast
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia's spiral of consumption grows ever wider and darker.

card.name: Praetor's Counsel
card.property: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Praetor's Counsel. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Phyrexian contagion corroded Karn's body, the praetors whispered psalms to corrupt his mind.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vorinclex removed its teeth so it wouldn't waste time chewing before moving to the next kill.

card.name: Rot Wolf
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Rot Wolf this turn dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Tangle Mantis
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fiercest hunters in the Tangle don't seek out the mantises. They are the mantises.

card.name: Thrun, the Last Troll
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Thrun, the Last Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His crime was silence, and now he suffers it eternally.

card.name: Unnatural Predation
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Domination by the strongest—that is all that matters in the Tangle now." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Viridian Corrupter
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Viridian Emissary
card.property: When Viridian Emissary dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Glissa, the Traitor
card.property: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tezzeret, Agent of Bolas
card.property: +1: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. −1: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5. −4: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is twice the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Bladed Sentinel
card.property: {W}: Bladed Sentinel gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirran partisans created hundreds of patrol sentinels to divert Phyrexian assaults from the Tangle.

card.name: Blightsteel Colossus
card.property: Trample, infect, indestructible If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Bonehoard
Brass Squire
card.property: {T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I admire it. Few pull off pluck and subservience at the same time." —Ezuri, renegade leader

card.name: Copper Carapace
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will fight as they do: our flesh protected behind metal." —Tae Aquil, Viridian weaponsmith

card.name: Core Prowler
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Core Prowler dies, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Darksteel Plate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there can be no victory, then I will fight forever." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Decimator Web
card.property: {4}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, gets a poison counter, then puts the top six cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mycosynth grew unfettered beneath the black lacuna, metastasizing into a matrix of noxious energy.

card.name: Dross Ripper
card.property: {2} {B}: Dross Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such a creation serves no purpose other than exterminating every one of us." —Sadra Alic, Neurok strategist

card.name: Flayer Husk
Gust-Skimmer
card.property: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexian smog clouds choked the skies, threatening creatures who couldn't comprehend the menace below.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause." —Ezuri, renegade leader

card.name: Ichor Wellspring
card.property: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our glorious infection has taken hold." —Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

card.name: Knowledge Pool
card.property: Imprint — When Knowledge Pool enters the battlefield, each player exiles the top three cards of their library. Whenever a player casts a spell from their hand, that player exiles it. If the player does, they may cast another nonland card exiled with Knowledge Pool without paying that card's mana cost.

card.name: Lumengrid Gargoyle
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anything that watches without sleep and fights without fear is a valuable ally against the Phyrexians." —Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

card.name: Magnetic Mine
card.property: Whenever another artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Magnetic Mine deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Mirrorworks
card.property: Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faces of Geth's corpse-dredgers are disturbingly similar.

card.name: Mortarpod
Myr Sire
card.property: When Myr Sire dies, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.

card.name: Myr Turbine
card.property: {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token. {T}, Tap five untapped Myr you control: Search your library for a Myr creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Myr Welder
card.property: Imprint — {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard. Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memnarch designed some myr to follow the levelers and reaffix lost parts. Mirran partisans put that instinct to good use.

card.name: Peace Strider
card.property: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle." —Kessla, Sylvok shaman

card.name: Phyrexian Digester
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our cause will ripen in the fertile flesh of the unworthy." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Phyrexian Juggernaut
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Phyrexian Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

card.name: Phyrexian Revoker
card.property: As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Basic senses like sight and taste are reserved for those in power.

card.name: Pierce Strider
card.property: When Pierce Strider enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Piston Sledge
card.property: When Piston Sledge enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Equip—Sacrifice an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the goblins could make a simple machine so complex.

card.name: Plague Myr
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.

card.name: Psychosis Crawler
card.property: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains." —Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

card.name: Razorfield Rhino
card.property: Metalcraft — Razorfield Rhino gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Adapted to tread on razorgrass, the rhino proved adept at treading on Phyrexians as well.

card.name: Rusted Slasher
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Regenerate Rusted Slasher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a beautiful vision. Discarded debris is reborn as a singular entity." —Urabrask the Hidden

card.name: Shimmer Myr
card.property: Flash You may cast artifact spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It evades Phyrexians by hiding in the spaces between seconds.

card.name: Shriekhorn
card.property: Shriekhorn enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Shriekhorn: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Signal Pest
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.

card.name: Silverskin Armor
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Partisan spies warned that no armor would protect the body from Phyrexian infection. Neurok strategists took that as a challenge.

card.name: Skinwing
Sphere of the Suns
card.property: Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Spin Engine
card.property: {R}: Target creature can't block Spin Engine this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It will be battle-ready before our strike at Oxid Ridge, and it will guarantee our victory." —Ketuc of the Helm

card.name: Spine of Ish Sah
card.property: When Spine of Ish Sah enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent. When Spine of Ish Sah is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spine of Ish Sah to its owner's hand.

card.name: Strandwalker
Sword of Feast and Famine
Tangle Hulk
card.property: {2} {G}: Regenerate Tangle Hulk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A true Phyrexian predator. It will never know death, just as nature intended." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Thopter Assembly
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and create five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Titan Forge
card.property: {3}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Titan Forge. {T}, Remove three charge counters from Titan Forge: Create a 9/9 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

card.name: Training Drone
card.property: Training Drone can't attack or block unless it's equipped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Vulshok flail, Viridian shield, loxodon blade . . . Tazzir, bring the Moriok hook and assemble the rookies." —Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

card.name: Viridian Claw
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexians can't corrupt what they can't get close enough to touch."

card.name: Contested War Zone
card.property: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, that creature's controller gains control of Contested War Zone. {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Inkmoth Nexus
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
